Brawler.Knight: Auto max soup refill on kill. (Make it a variable on how many soups they get per kill, if the variable is set higher than inventory capacity then auto max refill.)
Brawler.Fisherman: Fishing Rod teleports hooked players to you, and the direction you are facing. (Cooldown: 7 seconds)
Brawler.Enderman: Gain an enderpearl, retreieve the enderpearl upon a teleportation. (Cooldown: 4 seconds) (Feather Falling 10) (Jump Boost 1)
Brawler.Alpha: Summon 6 wolves that attacks your last hit opponent. (Duration: 15 seconds) (Cooldown: 35 seconds) (Wolf Damage: 10% max health pre-mitigation damage per wolf hit) (Wolf Health: 20 hearts aka 40 health)
Brawler.Viking: Summon a lightning bolt. (50% current health as pre-mitigation damage)
Brawler.Basilisk: Every 10th hit poison enemies for 3 seconds and grants you speed 1 for the same duration.
Brawler.Warrior: For every kill you are granted strength 1, speed 1, resistance 1, regeneration 3 for 6 seconds.
Brawler.Shaman: Heal for a percentage post-mitigation damage and steal all types of positive effects and enchantments. (Cooldown: 80 seconds) (Duration: 4 seconds) (Applying Slowness 3 for 10 seconds)
Brawler.Siphoner: Ability to drain the lifeforce of the opponents, has a bloodthirst for the weak. (Cooldown: 0.5 seconds) (Passive Cooldown: 1 second) (Speed 1 with a duration of 3 seconds when Passive is applied)

Duelist.Ninja: Teleport 1 block behind your closest target or last hit target. (Cooldown: 11 seconds) (Range: 8 blocks)
Duelist.Monkey: Change opponents currently held item to another slot in their hotbar (Cooldown: 5 seconds) | Swap HP with your opponent (Cooldown: 20 seconds) | Become invisible for 4 seconds. (Cooldown: 10 seconds)
Duelist.Hyper: Gain permanent speed 2. Speed level goes up for every 3rd hit with a cap of level 6 and decreases back to level 2 after 4 seconds of not hitting any opponents.
Duelist.Rogue: Go completely invisible/vanish for 8 seconds, while invisible gain an additional level of sharpness on your weapon and speed 2 for the duration you are invisible. (Cooldown: 60 seconds)
Duelist.Slayer: Passively restores 1 heart when critically striking and ability grants 2 additional levels of sharpness on the sword for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 80 seconds)
Duelist.Phoenix: Dash/launch forwards with Shift (Amount: 5 blocks) (Cooldown: 8 seconds)
Duelist.Challenger: You weaken your selected target until either one of you dies. (Weakness 1) (Cooldown: 120 seconds)

Ranged.Artillery: Get one arrow every 5 seconds, only if you don't have one already.
Ranged.Snowman: Your snowballs does 1 heart of true damage, applying slowness 1 on enemies for 1 seconds. Every 5 seconds your snowballs gets replenished if you already don't have 16 snowballs. (Capped @ 16 snowballs) (Spawns with 16 snowballs) (Speed 1)

Tank.Star: Emits an aura of darkness that applies slowness and blindess for 1 seconds also stun nearby players in a radius of 5 blocks for 3 seconds. (Health Boost 14 and Slowness 1)
Tank.Dragon: Blast enemies AOE (Radius: 8 blocks) (4 hearts of pre-mitigation damage) also ignites opponents for 4 seconds. (Cooldown: 40 seconds) (Fire Resistance 1)
Tank.Hedgehog: Resistance 2 (Cooldown: 20 seconds) (Thorn 50% of the opponents melee damage, not projectile damage.)
Tank.Juggernaut: Regeneration 5 for 10 seconds with a cooldown of 50 seconds. Gain half a heart after each kill. (Health Boost stacking 255 max) (Slowness 1)
